full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Title
# Gate Valve, NSN: 21-910-9712

#### Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of gate valves, NSN: 21-910-9712. The required products will be delivered to two locations: CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax. The solicitation is under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement.

#### Specification
- Article 1: 7 units of gate valve, NSN: 21-910-9712, Part No.: G-1235 REV 1, NCAGE: 38881
  * Unit of Issue: EA (Each)
  * Location: CFB Esquimalt
- Article 2: 13 units of gate valve, NSN: 21-910-9712, Part No.: G-1235 REV 1, NCAGE: 38881
  * Unit of Issue: EA (Each)
  * Location: CFB Halifax

#### Important Notes
- Bidders proposing Equivalent or Substitute Products must indicate the brand name, model, and/or Part Number, and the NCAGE they are offering.
- Prices must be quoted in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Normandin, Jean-Pierre
Jean-Pierre.Normandin@forces.gc.ca
819-939-3674

#### Tender Documents
The tender documents are available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/24/2e90f1418ab6b6dd317fba89d3108f95/rfp_w8482-230429-b-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/24/2e90f1418ab6b6dd317fba89d3108f95/rfp_w8482-230429-b-en.pdf) (English)
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/24/a71eabd4389f00c92013e7be19c3bf63/rfp_w8482-230429-b-fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub
